caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. At a racetrack, a duel is taking place between a knight in silver armor and a muscular man in black armor. The women in the stands are very nervous. The muscular man is knocked down by the knight in silver armor, and the knight wins. However, at that moment, the muscular man suddenly gets up, takes out a sword, and decapitates the horse. Then, he charges towards the knight in silver armor, catching him off guard and knocking him down.Just then, another man from the stands jumps in and duels with the muscular man. They fight fiercely until the organizer of the duel shouts for them to stop. Meanwhile, a woman and some men are guarding a small prisoner, and they suddenly come under attack.
